entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student who is observing Ron's reaction to something.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A student who makes a loud noise of disgust behind Harry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: The teacher who enters the room carrying an armful of freshly laundered Hogwarts robes.

relationships.description: Ron reacts with disgust to something Harry is doing, specifically holding up a long, maroon velvet dress.
Mrs. Weasley enters the room after Ron makes a loud noise of disgust behind Harry.
